info.title: App Information
info.technology-content:
The app was built using React Native, Expo, Firebase, and OpenAI integration.

Libraries: React Hook Form, Zod, React Native Reanimated, and many others.
info.description-content: FitnesApp was created for the ‚ÄúGolden App‚Äù contest. Its purpose is to help users track their physical activity and maintain a healthy lifestyle. The app features a chat with a virtual trainer to assist with exercise selection and meal planning. The app is available in both Polish and English.

collection.full-body-description: A complete workout to build overall strength.
collection.core-abs-description: Strengthen your core and sculpt your abs.
collection.lower-body-description: Strengthen and tone legs and glutes.
collection.upper-body-description: Boost strength in arms, chest, and back.
collection.hiit-description: Burn calories fast with high-intensity moves.

chat.exercise_tutorials_description: Instructional videos and proper technique guides

errors.nameTooShort: Name must be at least 2 characters long
errors.nameTooLong: Name can be up to 50 characters long
errors.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters long
errors.passwordMissingUppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
errors.passwordMissingNumber: Password must contain at least one number
